Title: Establishing a waiver program allowing for longer stays at domestic violence shelters
Summary: Establishes a waiver program allowing a domestic violence residential program to apply to the office of children and family services for a waiver enabling a victim of domestic violence to remain at the program's shelter for a period exceeding one hundred and eighty days.
LawCode: Amd ยง459-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing a waiver program allowing for longer stays at domestic violence shelters
